name: digiYo
description: A complete NFT marketplace with intended applications to the Batstoi Supreme sports metaverse built with Cadence, Flow's resource-oriented smart contract programming language.

MINTER_ADDRESS.description: The address where the digiYo Items contract for your app is deployed.

MINTER_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The the private key for the account where the digiYo Items contract for your app is deployed.

REACT_APP_CONTRACT_DIGIYO_TOKENS.description: The address where the digiYo tokens contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

REACT_APP_CONTRACT_DIGIYO_ITEMS.description: The address where the digiYo Items contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

REACT_APP_CONTRACT_PRIMARY_MARKET.description: The address where the digiYoItemsMarket contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

BLOCK_WINDOW.description: Look for events n blocks at a time.

FLOW_ACCESS_API_URL.description: URL for accessing the Flow tesntet gRPC API.

FUNGIBLE_TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: Address for the standard Fungible Token contract on testnet.

NON_FUNGIBLE_TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: Address for the standard Non-Fungible Token (NFT) contract on testnet.

MINTER_ACCOUNT_KEY_INDEX.description: Which key the minter account will use to sign transactions.

REACT_APP_FLOW_ACCESS_API_URL.description: URL for accessing the Flow tesntet gRPC API. (Used by @onflow/fcl)

REACT_APP_API_DIGIYO_TOKENS_MINT.description: RESTful endpoint for minting digiYo Tokens (Fungible Token).

REACT_APP_API_DIGIYO_ITEM_MINT.description: RESTful endpoint for minting digiYo Items (Non-Fungible Token).

REACT_APP_API_MARKET_ITEMS_LIST.description: RESTful endpoint for reading the latest marketplace SaleOffers.

REACT_APP_CONTRACT_FUNGIBLE_TOKEN.description: Address for the standard Fungible Token contract on testnet.

REACT_APP_CONTRACT_NON_FUNGIBLE_TOKEN.description: Address for the standard Non-Fungible Token (NFT) contract on testnet.

REACT_APP_WALLET_DISCOVERY.description: URL for fcl wallet discovery service for testnet wallets.
